title: VIP Tour Guide
responsibilities: Developed extensive knowledge of Walt Disney history, parks, resorts, and entertainment options, including past and present attractions, shows, and character meet-and-greets
Stayed up-to-date on new park openings, refurbishments, current news, and special events to provide guests with insider information
Led groups of up to 120 guests from diverse backgrounds on customized tours, ensuring timely and efficient navigation of the parks

Utilized effective and professional communication and interpersonal skills to engage guests, build rapport, and create memorable experiences in ever-changing situations, always seeking creative solutions

title: Owner/Web Developer Photographer
responsibilities: Designed and maintained portfolio website utilizing HTML5, CSS, PHP, WordPress, WooComerce, JavaScript, and React
Delivered high-quality images under tight deadlines, demonstrating strong time management skills
Recognized for exceptional communication skills and focused attention to detail
Managed day-to-day business operations
Developed and maintained strong relationships with clients, resulting in repeat business and referrals

title: Senior Web Developer
responsibilities: Streamlined development processes by utilizing version control systems such as Git
Managed multiple projects simultaneously under tight deadlines while maintaining high levels of quality assurance in deliverables
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and implement innovative web solutions for client projects
Stayed abreast of emerging web technologies, industry trends, and best practices to continuously improve skills and deliver cutting-edge solutions for clients such as AWS, C#, .NET, and Figma
Improved user experience with the development of intuitive navigation elements and user-friendly layouts

Major Project: Design and implement a data-driven component to an existing large-scale application for scheduling preferences to be used by thousands of Cast Members at Disneyland and Walt Disney World

title: Relief Coordinator | Team Trainer
responsibilities: Collaborated with Imagineering team to improve customer experience
Oversaw fast-paced attractions, assisting 1,500 guests per hour
Trained new employees job requirements and annual award recipient for work efforts
Entered data, generated reports, and produced tracking documents
Improved team productivity with regular communication and progress updates, fostering a collaborative work environment

title: Route Sales Manager
responsibilities: Invoiced accurately, coordinated shipping documentation and completed daily logs to satisfy record-keeping requirements and keep management informed of field activities
Identified revenue and sales goals and presented to sales team
Drove customer retention rates by consistently delivering exceptional service, fostering trust, and building lasting relationships with key decision-makers at each account
Followed traffic laws during delivery for safety of pedestrians and other vehicles
Managed multiple deliveries simultaneously, maximizing efficiency and productivity

title: Technical Support/Market Analyst
responsibilities: Assisted clients with new technology in hardware and software
Analyzed market big data from up to 15 companies and compiled concise weekly reports
Leveraged predictive analytics techniques to anticipate changes in consumer demand patterns, guiding proactive strategy adjustments.
Reduced costs by streamlining market research processes for efficient data gathering and reporting.
Assessed customer satisfaction levels through surveys and focus groups, informing improvements to products/services offerings.

title: General Theatre/Marketing Manager
responsibilities: Coordinated promotional events with film production companies and local vendors to increase attendance 210%
Conducted regular evaluations of staff performance identifying strengths weaknesses providing feedback professional development opportunities.
Concession sales increased 100% per capita
Boosted brand awareness and generated leads while managing internal and external marketing campaigns and programs.
Managed social media accounts for optimal audience engagement and increased online presence.
